title: CRM Integration Framework
description: Bi-directional sync infrastructure for lightweight CRMs. Includes: OAuth2 connection manager (store/refresh tokens per tenant), configurable field mapping engine (our schema ↔ CRM schema), sync scheduler (periodic pull + push), conflict resolution strategy (last-write-wins or manual review), and sync status dashboard. Designed as a reusable framework — each CRM connector implements a standard adapter interface. Tracks sync history and provides audit trail.
